meanings.definition: A tropical climbing plant with large glossy leaves.
meanings.sent1: The philodendra in the garden are growing taller every day.
meanings.sent2: I love the vibrant green color of philodendra leaves.
meanings.sent3: The philodendra decided to have a race to see who could climb the highest.
meanings.sent4: Her love for philodendra was as strong as the vines that wrapped around the tree.
meanings.sent5: The philodendra leaves shimmered in the sunlight, like emerald jewels.

meanings.definition: The genus of plants to which the philodendra belong.
meanings.sent1: Many botanists study the philodendra genus to learn more about tropical plants.
meanings.sent2: The philodendra genus includes a wide variety of climbing plants.
meanings.sent3: At the botanical garden, the philodendra genus threw a party for all the other plant genera.
meanings.sent4: In the forest, the philodendra genus stood out like royalty among the trees.
meanings.sent5: Exploring the philodendra genus felt like discovering a hidden treasure in the jungle.
